Quickstrike:




Quickstrike picked himself up after the punch from Shredder. He checked the 
side of his face to make sure that the curved metal at his cheeks were not 
bent. It was okay. He threw a pretty good punch. But there was no way 
Shredder was going to get away with that.

"Ah'll show ya, ya slaggin'..." He charged at Shredder from behind and 
rammed into him, grabbing him around the torso as they went down.

>::Shredder::
>
>Shredder clentches his fists in anger. "FORGOT?! I'll make you forget!!!"
>Shredder screams, sending another punch at Quickstrike before turning 
>around
>and walking off toward the CR tanks.
